tool.name: SAGA.pointcloud_tools.8
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayIN False output_data_OUT $output_data_OUT name SAGA.pointcloud_tools.8 IN $IN DX $DX DY $DY DZ $DZ ANGLEX $ANGLEX ANGLEY $ANGLEY ANGLEZ $ANGLEZ SCALEX $SCALEX SCALEY $SCALEY SCALEZ $SCALEZ ANCHORX $ANCHORX ANCHORY $ANCHORY ANCHORZ $ANCHORZ prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUT $OutputSection_OUT.outputType_OUT transmissionMode_OUT $OutputSection_OUT.transmissionMode_OUT

param.name: IN
param.label: Input
param.help: Input The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-lasf

param.name: ANGLEX
param.label: Angle X
param.help: Angle in degrees, clockwise around x axis

param.name: ANGLEY
param.label: Angle Y
param.help: Angle in degrees, clockwise around y axis

param.name: ANGLEZ
param.label: Angle Z
param.help: Angle in degrees, clockwise around z axis

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: The tool can be used to shift, rotate and/or scale a Point Cloud.<br/><br/>
